definition: Qing dynasty person
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: The author yields five lost works from poems collection in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 笔者从清人诗文集中辑得佚文五篇。

sentences.english: There Qing had killed his mother.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，清人杀害了他的母亲。

sentences.english: Six Chapters of a Floating Life is an individual memoir of SHEN Fu who lived in QING Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《浮生六记》是清人沈复所著的一部个人回忆录。

sentences.english: This literary phenomenon was affected by the social morals and esthetic ideas at that time.
sentences.chinese: 这一文学现象与清代社会风气与清人审美观念有关。
